sentence: Vying for the Democratic nomination are attorney Morgan Harper, Traci Johnson, Congressman Tim Ryan and LaShondra Tinsley, according to the Ohio Debate Commission.
author: Chelsea Simeon
title: Valley Congressman Tim Ryan confirms plans to participate in statewide debate

sentence: Candidates who will be participating in Monday’s debate will be Morgan Harper, Traci “TJ” Johnson, and Congressman Tim Ryan.
author: Peter Curi
title: Ohio DNC Senate candidates face off in debate

author: Maeve Walsh
title: Which Republicans are running to represent Ohio in the U.S. Senate?
